headline: Becton Dickinson (NYSE:BDX) Sees 18% Price Dip Over Last Week
summary: Becton Dickinson (NYSE:BDX) recently announced mixed second-quarter financial results with increased sales but lower net income and EPS. Despite raising its earnings guidance slightly, the company's stock fell 18.39% over the last week. This drop contrasts with the market's 2.2% climb in the same period. The company's updated guidance and share buyback initiatives imply strategic efforts to bolster value, which may have been countered by broader market concerns over tariffs and the economic...
